57.eng-name: One-fifth of Booty to the Cause of Allah (Khumus)

hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin Mughaffal:While we were besieging the fort of Khaibar, a person threw a leather container containing fat, and I ran to take it, but when I turned I saw the Prophet (standing behind), so I felt embarrassed in front of him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُصِيبُ مِنَ الطَّعَامِ فِي أَرْضِ الْحَرْبِ
chapter.eng-name: The food gained as war booty in the battlefield
